news_header: Nisun International expects a profit of $16M to $20M and revenue of $420M to $510M for FY 2025.
news_original_title: Nisun Intl Enterprise Announces FY25 Outlook
news_text: Nisun International Enterprise Development Group Co., Ltd (NISN) announced its financial outlook for fiscal year 2025, projecting a profit between $16 million and $20 million, with revenue expected to be between $420 million and $510 million. The company anticipates growth driven by its supply chain financing solutions and recent expansion in the KFC franchise business, forecasting an overall performance growth of 25 to 50 percent. Currently, Nisun's stock is trading at $7.24, reflecting a 2.55 percent increase on the Nasdaq.
